title: following provisions of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 

(Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic road act 2023 (commencement) order 2025

title: following provisions of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023)
heading: 2. The 27th day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 27th day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023) 
shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 4; 

(b) paragraphs (a) and (c) of section 11. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 February, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [53] 3
